CustomField.description: A key initiative is a set of related projects which leverage critical value streams within the enterprise. An initiative can rely on one or more value streams and/or zones (sub-processes owned by named teams).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select a key initiative.A key initiative is a set of related projects which leverage critical value streams within the enterprise. An initiative can rely on one or more value streams and/or zones (sub-processes owned by named teams).
CustomField.label: Key Initiative
